Title: anti-Taiwanese contacts poster
Publisher: Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局)
Notes: From a set of six posters, published by the Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局), warning against listening to Taiwanese propaganda.The text reads "Anyone who writes or posts counter-revolutionary slogans or distributes counter-revolutionary leaflets will be held criminally responsible.“The texts on some of the leaflets reads "Oppose ..." and "Down with ...".
